welcome_message: Welcome to MLOps Stacks. For detailed information on project generation, see the README at https://github.com/databricks/mlops-stacks/blob/main/README.md.

input_project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Project name must be at least 3 characters long and cannot contain the following characters: "\", "/", " " and ".".

input_read_user_group.description:
User group name to give READ permissions to for project resources
(ML jobs, integration test job runs, and machine learning resources).
A group with this name must exist in both the staging and prod workspaces.
Default

input_include_models_in_unity_catalog.description: Whether to use the Model Registry with Unity Catalog

input_unity_catalog_read_user_group.description:
User group name to give EXECUTE privileges to models in Unity Catalog (UC).
It must exist in UC with access granted to the staging and prod workspaces.
Default

input_inference_table_name.description:
Fully qualified name of inference table to attach monitoring to.
This table must already exist and service principals must have access.
input_inference_table_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Fully qualified Unity Catalog table names must have catalog, schema, and table separated by "." and each cannot contain any of the following characters: " ", ".", "-", "\", "/"
